Explanations.a: Downgraded by one level due to serious risk of bias. Lack of allocation concealment in both studies, high risk of attrition bias in one of the two studies.
Explanations.b: Downgraded by one level due to serious indirectness. The evidence is based on a population who are non-MTX csDMARD naive.
Explanations.d: csDMARD monotherapy includes: MTX or SSZ
Explanations.e: Downgraded by one level due to serious risk of bias. Lack of allocation concealment.
Explanations.f: Downgraded by one level due to serious imprecision. Low sample size.
Explanations.g: Downgraded by two levels due to very serious imprecision. Confidence intervals include both values suggesting benefit and values suggesting harm. Small sample size, very low number of events.

Explanations.a: csDMARD triple therapy includes MTX + SSZ + HCQ.
Explanations.c: Downgraded by one level due to serious imprecision. Confidence interval includes both values suggesting no effect and values suggesting harm. Low number of events.
